noToken.title: No Session Found
noToken.message: You don't have a valid session token.
noToken.instruction: Please create a new session to access this application.

profile.description: Customize how the bot appears and behaves in your server.

premiumRequired.title: Supporter Feature
premiumRequired.message: Profile customization requires you to be a supporter.

localeOverridesRequired.message: Custom reputation name requires locale overrides feature.

nickname.label: Bot Nickname
nickname.description: Set a custom nickname for the bot in this server.

profilePicture.label: Profile Picture
profilePicture.description: Upload a custom profile picture for the bot (max 2MB, 512x512 pixels)

reputationName.label: Reputation Name
reputationName.description: Customize the name used for reputation in this server.

profile.tosNote: Anything that violates Discord's TOS or state law is not allowed and might result in blocking this feature for the server.

general.description: Configure the basic settings of the bot for this server.

language.label: Bot Language
language.description: Choose the language the bot will use for messages and responses in this server.

systemChannel.label: System Channel
systemChannel.description: Choose the channel where the bot will send system messages and announcements.
systemChannel.note: Note: This channel should be set and should be an internal channel. It will contain important messages concerning the bot's service and messages from the developers.

ranks.description: Configure the reputation ranks and their associated roles.

stackRoles.label: Stack Roles
stackRoles.description: If enabled, all applicable ranks will be assigned instead of only the highest rank.

ranks.roleAlreadyAdded: This role already has a rank.
ranks.reputationAlreadyUsed: This reputation value is already used by another rank.

reputation.description: Configure how reputation is calculated and which features are enabled.

mode.label: Reputation Mode
mode.description: Choose how reputation is calculated and displayed.

descriptions.TOTAL: Use the total reputation a user has ever received.
descriptions.ROLLING_WEEK: Use reputation received in the last 7 days.
descriptions.ROLLING_MONTH: Use reputation received in the last 30 days.
descriptions.WEEK: Use reputation received since the start of the current week.
descriptions.MONTH: Use reputation received since the start of the current month.

resetDate.label: Reset Date
resetDate.description: The date when reputation counts will be reset. Set a date in the future to schedule a reset.

reaction.label: Reaction Reputation
reaction.description: Give reputation when a specific reaction is added to a message.

confirmation.label: Reaction Confirmation
confirmation.description: Send a confirmation message when reputation is given via reaction.

answer.label: Answer Reputation
answer.description: Give reputation when a user's message is thanked in an answer.

mention.label: Mention Reputation
mention.description: Give reputation when a user is mentioned along with a thank word.

fuzzy.label: Fuzzy Matching
fuzzy.description: Give reputation by matching words around the thank word to user names present in the channel.

embed.label: Embed Reputation
embed.description: Send an embed listing users present in the last conversation if no target can be determined.

direct.label: Direct Embed Reputation
direct.description: Give reputation automatically when only one user would be contained in the embed.

ephemeral.label: Ephemeral Response
ephemeral.description: Send the response hidden to other users when giving reputation via command.

roles.description: Configure which roles are allowed to give and receive reputation.

donor.label: Donor Roles
donor.description: If enabled, only users with at least one of these roles can give reputation.

receiver.label: Receiver Roles
receiver.description: If enabled, only users with at least one of these roles can receive reputation.

list.label: Selected Roles
list.description: Choose which roles should be required.

channels.description: Configure where the bot should and shouldn't be active.

listType.label: List Type
listType.description: Choose whether the selected channels and categories are allowed or denied.
listType.premiumRequired: The Deny List feature is reserved for supporters. Become a supporter to use it.

list.label: Channels and Categories
list.description: Select channels and categories that should be part of the list.

premium.limitReached: You have reached the limit of selected channels/categories for your current plan.
premium.limitWarning: Selecting more than {limit} channels/categories is reserved for supporters. Become a supporter to use it.
premium.channelLimitWarning: Selecting more than {limit} is reserved for supporters. Become a supporter to use it.
premium.categoryLimitWarning: Selecting more than {limit} is reserved for supporters. Become a supporter to use it.

reactions.title: Reactions
reactions.description: Configure the emojis used for giving reputation.

main.label: Main Reaction
main.description: The emoji that will be used as the primary reaction for giving reputation.

additional.label: Additional Reactions
additional.description: Additional emojis that can also be used to give reputation.
additional.premiumRequired: Additional reactions are reserved for supporters. Become a supporter to use it.

thankwords.title: Thankwords
thankwords.description: These words will be used to detect when someone is being thanked. They are interpreted as Regular Expressions.
thankwords.invalidCharacter: The thankword contains an invalid character: {char}

defaults.title: Default Thankwords
defaults.description: Quickly add default thankwords for various languages.

abuseProtection.description: Configure limits and protections to prevent reputation abuse.

cooldown.label: Cooldown (minutes)
cooldown.description: The time in minutes that must pass before the same users can thank each other again. 0 means no cooldown, -1 means forever.

once.label: Cooldown Once
once.description: If enabled, users can only thank each other once forever.
once.activeDescription: Cooldown once is active. Users can only thank each other once. Direction is set to unidirectional.

cooldownDirection.label: Cooldown Direction
cooldownDirection.description: Unidirectional means the donor has a cooldown on giving to the same person. Bidirectional means the cooldown is between the donor and receiver, preventing them from thanking each other back and forth until the time passed.

maxMessageAge.label: Max Message Age (minutes)
maxMessageAge.description: The maximum age of a message (in minutes) to be eligible for reputation when answered or reacted to.

minMessages.label: Min Messages
minMessages.description: Authors with at least this many messages in the channel are always eligible to receive reputation.

donorContext.label: Donor must be present
donorContext.description: If enabled, the donor must have sent at least one of the last messages in the channel to give reputation.

receiverContext.label: Receiver must be present
receiverContext.description: If enabled, the receiver must have sent at least one of the last messages in the channel to receive reputation.

givenLimit.description: Limit how much reputation a user can give within a certain timeframe.

receivedLimit.description: Limit how much reputation a user can receive within a certain timeframe.

maxMessageReputation.label: Max Message Reputation
maxMessageReputation.description: The maximum amount of reputation that can be given in a single message via mentions and embeds.

announcements.description: Configure messages sent when users reach new ranks.

active.label: Enable Announcements
active.description: If enabled, the bot will send a message when a user reaches a new rank.

sameChannel.label: Send in Same Channel
sameChannel.description: If enabled, the announcement will be sent in the channel where the level up happened. Otherwise, it will be sent to the selected channel.

channel.label: Announcement Channel
channel.description: Select the channel where rank up announcements should be sent.

autopost.description: Configure automatic posting of the leaderboard to a channel.

premiumRequired.title: Supporter Feature
premiumRequired.message: The autopost feature is exclusive to supporters.

active.label: Enable Autopost
active.description: Enable or disable the automatic leaderboard posting.

channel.label: Autopost Channel
channel.description: The channel where the leaderboard should be posted.

refreshInterval.label: Refresh Interval
refreshInterval.description: How often the leaderboard should be updated.

refreshType.label: Refresh Type
refreshType.description: How the post should be updated.

messages.description: Configure messages and confirmations sent by the bot.

premiumRequired.title: Supporter Feature
premiumRequired.message: The log channel feature is exclusive to supporters.

logChannel.description: The log channel will contain every reputation given and taken from a user.

active.label: Enable Log Channel
active.description: Enable or disable logging of reputation changes.

channel.label: Log Channel
channel.description: The channel where reputation changes should be logged.
